languages.text: "Ну, почти... Губернатор не угодил {rt_mf|ему|ей} даром и был сурово наказан! Теперь, стоит Звездн{rt_mf|ому|ой} Госпо{rt_mf|дину|жу} взглянуть, сам Руолдо трясется так, что зубы клацают — хоть гвозди ими забивай! Хоть кого-то наши богачеи теперь боятся".

traits.locale_text: "Я видела, как после этого он{mf||а} нагнал{mf||а} скомороха и переломал{mf||а} ему ноги за дерзость. Не так прост{mf||а} Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}".

languages.text: "Well, almost... The governor's gift wasn't to {rt_mf|his|her} liking, and Ruoldo was punished severely for it! Now, every time the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} so much as looks at him, he quivers, and his teeth clatter so badly, you could use his jaw as a hammer! Finally, someone our rich folks are afraid of."
languages.original_text: "Ну, почти... Губернатор не угодил {rt_mf|ему|ей} даром и был сурово наказан! Теперь, стоит Звездн{rt_mf|ому|ой} Госпо{rt_mf|дину|жу} взглянуть, сам Руолдо трясется так, что зубы клацают — хоть гвозди ими забивай! Хоть кого-то наши богачеи теперь боятся".

traits.locale_text: "Well, almost... The governor's gift wasn't to {rt_mf|his|her} liking, and Ruoldo was punished severely for it! Now every time the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} so much as looks at him, he shakes and his teeth clatter so badly, you could use his jaw as a hammer! Finally, someone our rich folks are afraid of."

"Well, almost... The governor's gift wasn't to {rt_mf|his|her} liking, and Ruoldo was punished severely for it! Now every time the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} so much as looks at him, he shakes and his teeth clatter so badly, you could use his jaw as a hammer! Finally, someone our rich folks are afraid of."

Finally, someone our rich folks are afraid of."

Finally, someone our rich folks are afraid of."

"Well, almost... The governor's gift wasn't to {rt_mf|his|her} liking, and Ruoldo was punished severely for it! Now, every time the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} so much as looks at him, he quivers, and his teeth clatter so badly, you could use his jaw as a hammer! Finally, someone our rich folks are afraid of."

"Well, almost... The governor's gift wasn't to {rt_mf|his|her} liking, and Ruoldo was punished severely for it! Now, every time the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} so much as looks at him, he quivers, and his teeth clatter so badly, you could use his jaw as a hammer! Finally, someone our rich folks are afraid of."

languages.text: “差不多算是吧……那位大人对总督的礼物不太满意，罗尔多也受到了相当严厉的惩罚！现在，每当那位来自上界的大人看着罗尔多时，他都会吓得牙齿打颤，下巴简直可以当锤子用了！那些有钱的家伙终于有害怕的人了。”
languages.original_text: "Well, almost... The governor's gift wasn't to {rt_mf|his|her} liking, and Ruoldo was punished severely for it! Now, every time the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} so much as looks at him, he quivers, and his teeth clatter so badly, you could use his jaw as a hammer! Finally, someone our rich folks are afraid of."

traits.locale_text: “差不多算是吧……那位大人对总督的礼物不太满意，罗尔多也受到了相当严厉的惩罚！现在，每当那位来自上界的大人看着罗尔多时，他都会吓得牙齿打颤，下巴简直可以当锤子用了！那些有钱的家伙终于有害怕的人了。”

languages.text: «Bueno, casi... El regalo del gobernador no fue de su gusto, ¡y Ruoldo sufrió un castigo ejemplar por ello! Ahora, cada vez que {rt_mf|el Señor|la Señora} Celestial mira en su dirección, ¡se echa a temblar y sus dientes castañetean con tanta fuerza que se podría usar su barbilla como martillo! Por fin hay alguien que asusta a nuestros ricos».
languages.original_text: "Well, almost... The governor's gift wasn't to {rt_mf|his|her} liking, and Ruoldo was punished severely for it! Now, every time the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} so much as looks at him, he quivers, and his teeth clatter so badly, you could use his jaw as a hammer! Finally, someone our rich folks are afraid of."

traits.locale_text: «Bueno, casi... El regalo del gobernador no fue de su gusto, ¡y Ruoldo sufrió un castigo ejemplar por ello! Ahora, cada vez que {rt_mf|el Señor|la Señora} Celestial mira en su dirección, ¡se echa a temblar y sus dientes castañetean con tanta fuerza que se podría usar su barbilla como martillo! Por fin hay alguien que asusta a nuestros ricos».

languages.text: "Gerçi... Valinin armağanı onun hoşuna gitmedi, Ruoldo da bunun cezasını ağır ödedi! Artık Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz} ona göz ucuyla baksa titriyor, dişleri öyle takırdıyor ki çenesiyle çivi çakarsın! Nihayet zenginlerimizin korktuğu biri çıktı."
languages.original_text: "Well, almost... The governor's gift wasn't to {rt_mf|his|her} liking, and Ruoldo was punished severely for it! Now, every time the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} so much as looks at him, he quivers, and his teeth clatter so badly, you could use his jaw as a hammer! Finally, someone our rich folks are afraid of."

traits.locale_text: "Gerçi... Valinin armağanı onun hoşuna gitmedi, Ruoldo da bunun cezasını ağır ödedi! Artık Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz} ona göz ucuyla baksa titriyor, dişleri öyle takırdıyor ki çenesiyle çivi çakarsın! Nihayet zenginlerimizin korktuğu biri çıktı."
"Boş ver onu! Sonrasında soytarıyı kovalayıp küstahlığı için bacaklarını kırdığını gördüm. Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz} tam bir âlem."

languages.text: 「まあ…惜しかったよ。総督の贈り物は{rt_mf|彼|彼女}のお気に召さなくて、ルオルド様はそのせいで厳しく罰されたんだ！今では、天の{rt_mf|君|姫}がほんの少し視線を向けただけで、ルオルド様は震え上がって歯がガチガチ鳴って、顎をハンマーに使えるくらいなんだよ！ついに金持ち連中が恐れてやまない人が現れたんだ」
languages.original_text: "Well, almost... The governor's gift wasn't to {rt_mf|his|her} liking, and Ruoldo was punished severely for it! Now, every time the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} so much as looks at him, he quivers, and his teeth clatter so badly, you could use his jaw as a hammer! Finally, someone our rich folks are afraid of."

traits.locale_text: 「まあ…惜しかったよ。総督の贈り物は{rt_mf|彼|彼女}のお気に召さなくて、ルオルド様はそのせいで厳しく罰されたんだ！今では、天の{rt_mf|君|姫}がほんの少し視線を向けただけで、ルオルド様は震え上がって歯がガチガチ鳴って、顎をハンマーに使えるくらいなんだよ！ついに金持ち連中が恐れてやまない人が現れたんだ」

languages.text: « Eh bien, presque... Le cadeau du gouverneur n'était pas à son goût, c'est pourquoi {rt_mf|il|elle} l'a sévèrement puni ! Maintenant, chaque fois que Sa Céleste Seigneurie regarde Ruoldo, il se met à trembler comme une feuille et ses dents claquent tellement que l'on pourrait se servir de sa mâchoire comme d'un marteau ! Nos riches citoyens ont enfin rencontré quelqu'un qu'ils craignent. »
languages.original_text: "Well, almost... The governor's gift wasn't to {rt_mf|his|her} liking, and Ruoldo was punished severely for it! Now, every time the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} so much as looks at him, he quivers, and his teeth clatter so badly, you could use his jaw as a hammer! Finally, someone our rich folks are afraid of."

traits.locale_text: « Eh bien, presque... Le cadeau du gouverneur n'était pas à son goût, c'est pourquoi {rt_mf|il|elle} l'a sévèrement puni ! Maintenant, chaque fois que Sa Céleste Seigneurie regarde Ruoldo, il se met à trembler comme une feuille et ses dents claquent tellement que l'on pourrait se servir de sa mâchoire comme d'un marteau ! Nos riches citoyens ont enfin rencontré quelqu'un qu'ils craignent. »

languages.text: "Na ja, fast ... Das Geschenk des Gouverneurs hat {rt_mf|ihm|ihr} nicht gefallen, und Ruoldo wurde dafür schwer bestraft! Wenn {rt_mf|der himmlische Herr|die himmlische Herrin} ihn jetzt auch nur ansieht, zittert er, und seine Zähne klappern so stark, dass sein Kiefer als Hammer dienen könnte! Endlich jemand, vor dem unsere Reichen Angst haben."
languages.original_text: "Well, almost... The governor's gift wasn't to {rt_mf|his|her} liking, and Ruoldo was punished severely for it! Now, every time the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} so much as looks at him, he quivers, and his teeth clatter so badly, you could use his jaw as a hammer! Finally, someone our rich folks are afraid of."

traits.locale_text: "Na ja, fast ... Das Geschenk des Gouverneurs hat {mf|ihm|ihr} nicht gefallen, und Ruoldo wurde dafür schwer bestraft! Wenn {mf|der himmlische Herr|die himmlische Herrin} ihn jetzt auch nur ansieht, zittert er, und seine Zähne klappern so stark, dass sein Kiefer als Hammer dienen könnte! Endlich jemand, vor dem unsere Reichen Angst haben."
